page.title: 04THE GROWTH OF FENCE
page.content: Since the bypass was built,the village has grown rapidly.Before the bypass there were about one hundred houses altogether.The terraced houses are grouped together on the main road.Most of the semi-detached houses are also on the main road but some are on the estates with the detached houses.Fence is still growing and there are plans for more estates.The most notable buildings in Fence are the pubs,the church of England,the Methodist church,Green Slate,the Mill,the shops and the school.The oldest building in Fence is Hoarstones and it dates back to the 1700's.There are three pubs and one mill which makes upholstery for furniture.Green Slate is a craft shop that makes clocks,penholders,etc,out of green slate.The Methodist school and the church was built in 1867.
